text: E'ina hu'negu Ra Anumzamo'a amanage huno hu'ne, Antahiho, Nagra hanugeno tima hageaza huno maka ama mopafi vahe'mokizmi feno zamo'a Jerusalemi kumapina eme avitenigeno, mago zankura atupara osugahie. Ana zantamima erinutma tusi muse hugahaze. Mago a'mo mofavre'a azampi avre'neno ami amigeno neneno muse hiaza nehuta, nerera'a amote avrenteneno zokago renenteaza hugahaze.
